reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 492/99: TOWN OF PICKERING - ALTERATION OF STATUS
reg_info.reg_name_text: TOWN OF PICKERING — ALTERATION OF STATUS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 492/99: TOWN OF PICKERING - ALTERATION OF STATUS
reg_info.act_under: Regional Municipalities Act   Loi sur les municipalités régionales

content.content: 1. The Corporation of the Town of Pickering is erected into a city municipality bearing the name The Corporation of the City of Pickering. O. Reg. 492/99, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The Corporation of the Town of Pickering is erected into a city municipality bearing the name The Corporation of the City of Pickering. O. Reg. 492/99, s. 1.

content.content: 2. A reference in any general or special Act to The Town of Pickering or The Corporation of the Town of Pickering shall be deemed to be a reference to The Corporation of the City of Pickering. O. Reg. 492/99, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. A reference in any general or special Act to The Town of Pickering or The Corporation of the Town of Pickering shall be deemed to be a reference to The Corporation of the City of Pickering. O. Reg. 492/99, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 492/99, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 492/99, s. 3.
